17061.<start_lip_sync n00035 _normal m00001>「…:

17062.<start_lip_sync n00035 _normal m00001>「こ:

17063.<start_lip_sync n00035 _normal m00001>「…:

17065.<start_lip_sync n00035 _normal m00001>「そ:

17068.<start_lip_sync n00216 _normal m00001>「あ: <start_lip_sync n00216 _normal m00001>Ah, yes! I just remembered!<stop_lip_animation n00216 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17069.<start_lip_sync n00216 _normal m00001>「授:

17070.<start_lip_sync n00216 _normal m00001>「一:

17071.<start_lip_sync n00216 _normal m00001>「そ:

17072.<start_lip_sync n00216 _normal m00001>「ど:

17077.<start_lip_sync n00037 _normal m00001>「は:

17078.<start_lip_sync n00037 _normal m00001>「た:

17080.<start_lip_sync n00037 _normal m00001>「昔:

17081.<start_lip_sync n00037 _normal m00001>「学:

17082.<start_lip_sync n00037 _normal m00001>「そ:
